projects.name: Nebula Clash
projects.description: A full-stack contest creation platform, Nebula Clash, featuring contest creation, user participation, and winner selection. Implemented user roles(admin, user, creator), each with a dedicated dashboard, authentication, and a dynamic leaderboard, enhancing user engagement and experience with glassmorphism UI.

projects.name: Swap Savvy
projects.description: An interactive platform that enable users to explore and contribute to a database of alternative product information, including queries, recommendations, and user-created contents.

projects.name: Canvas Whisper
projects.description: A CRUD application that can interact with user, enabling the connection to database and provide protected routes also user can modify their own crafts after authorization.
